attributes.action: not financially support non insured victims of the recent UK floods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Homeowners with insurance should not be expected to fund those without insurance.  As insurance payers we must not be penalised twice by increased premiums next year as well as supporting the mistakes of others.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
